descriptionHtml:
Hi, this mod is based on My little kitten by hl84(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26445/?) and credit for creating model and so on goes to him, i basicly just added the new race as playable and added another mod so you he gets the correct green eyes(not sure if you can change it, 1st mod made by a lazy person so didnt bother to check or do it in a better way, so srry)

As far as i know, just install the file and start using it, to create the new race just pick the other khajiit in the race menu.

Again I am lazy,terrible at the creation kit and this is my first mod so not best made mod, so after you create the character you need to type "player.setscale 0.75" in the console to become small and there is only 1 haircut at the moment.

Sorry for the sloppy mod but if you really want to play as a khajiit child i guess this wil have to do it for now

All credits goes to hl84 for making this as i just slightly edited it, if it does not work at all tell me and i will try to fix that at least.

If anyone wants to make a better mod using this a basis, feel free to do it, credit would be nice but not needed
author: Brummond
